sections.text: brahma saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam|kṣatraṃ sandhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam|iṣaṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam|Urjaṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam|rayiṃ saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam|puṣṭiṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam|prajAṃ saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam|paśUn thsaMdhattaM̍ tAnmE# jinvatam||stutO&si̍ janadhAḥ|dEvAstvA̍# śukrapAḥ praṇayantu||1̍ (10)

suvIrA̱ḥ prajAḥ prajanayan̍ parIhi|śukraḥ̍ śukraśOciṣA||stutO̍&si̍ janadhAḥ|dEvAstvA̍# manthipAḥ praṇayantu||suprajAḥ̍ prajAḥ prajanayan̍ parIhi|manthI̍ manthiśOciṣA||sajaMqgmAnau̍ diva A pRuthivyA&&yu̍ḥ|saMdha̍ttaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam|prAṇaṃ saMdhattaM̍ taM mE# jinvatam|apAnaṃ saMdhattaM̍ taM mE# jinvatam|2 (10)

vyAnaṃ saMdhattaM̍ taM mE# jinvatam|cakṣuḥ saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam|śrOtraṃq saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam|manaḥ saMdhattaM̍ tanmE# jinvatam|vAcaṃq saMdhattaM̍ tAM mE# jinvatam||Ayuḥ̍ stha AyurmE̍ dhattam|Ayur̍ yajñAya# dhattam|Ayur̍ yajñapatayE̍ dhattam|prAṇaḥ sthaḥ̍ prAṇaM mE# dhattam|prAṇaM ~MyajñAya# dhattam|3 (10)

prAṇaM ~MyajñapatayE̍ dhattam|cakṣuḥ̍ sthaścakṣurmE̍ dhattam|cakṣur̍ yajñAya# dhattam|cakṣur̍ yajñapatayE̍ dhattam|śrOtraṅ# sthaḥ śrOtraM̍ mE dhattam|śrOtraM̍ ~MyajñAya# dhattam|śrOtraM̍ ~MyajñapatayE̍ dhattam|tau dEvau̍ śukrAmanthinau|kalpayataM̍ daivIrviśaḥ|kalpaya̍taM̍ mAnuṣIḥ|4̍ (10)

iṣa-mUrjamasmAsu̍# dhattam|prAṇAn paśuṣu|prajAM̍ mayi# ca yajamAnE̍ ca||nirastaḥ̍ śaṇḍaḥ|nira̍stO̍ markaḥ||apa̍nuttau̍ śaṇḍAmarkau# sahAmunA̱||śukrasya# samidasi|manthina̍ḥ̍ samidasi||sa̍ prathamaḥ̍ saMkRutir̍ viśvakarmA|sa̍ prathamO̍ mitrO varuṇO̍ agniḥ ( )|sa prathamO̍ bRuhaspatiścikitvAn|tasmA̍ indrAya̍ sutamAjuhOmi||5̍ (12) (naya - ntvapAnaṃ saMdhattaMq̍ taM mE# jinvataM - prAṇaM ~MyajñAya# dhattaMq - mAnuṣIr̍ - agnir dvE ca)̍ (A1) (śpEcial kOrvai fOr Anuvakam 1 ) brahma# kṣatraM tat|iṣamUrjaṃ# rayiM puṣṭiM̍ prajAM tAm|paśun tAn|sandhattaM̍ tat|prAṇamapAnaM̍ ~MvyAnaM tam|cakṣuḥ śrOtraM manastat|vAcaM tAm|iṣAdipa~jcakE̍ vAcaM tAM mE̱|paśUn thsaMdhattaM̍ tAnmE̱|prAṇAditritayE̍ taM mE̱|anyatra tanmE̱|) 1.1.2 anuvAkaM 2 - athAgnyAdhAnaprakaraṇaM, tatra kAlaviśEṣavidhiḥ

kRuttikA-svagni-mAda̍dhIta|EtadvA̍ agnEr nakṣatram|yat̍ kRuttikAḥ|svAyA̍mEvaina̍M̍ dEvatAyAmAdhAya̍|brahmavarcasI̍ Bavati||muKaM̍ ~MvA EtannakṣatrAṇAm|yat̍ kRuttikAḥ|yaḥ̍ kRuttikA-svagni-mA̍dhattE|muKya̍# Eva Bavati||athO̍ Kalu|6̍ (10)

agni-nakṣatramitya-pacAyanti|gRuhAnḥa̍ dAhukO̍ Bavati||prajApatI̍ rOhiṇyA-magni-masRujata|taM̍ dEvA rOhiṇyA-mAda̍dhata|tatO̍ vai tE sarvAn rOhAnarOhann|tad-rO̍hiṇyai̍ rOhiṇitvam|yO̍ rOhiṇyA-magnimA̍dhattE|RudhnOtyEva|sarvAn̍ rOhA̱n-rOhati||dEvA vai BadrAḥ santO&gni-mAdhithsanta|7̍ (10)

tEṣAmanAhitO̍ &gnirAsI̱t|athai̱ByO vAmaM ~MvasvapA̱krAmat|tE punarvasvOrAda̍dhata|tatO̍ vai tAn vAmaM ~MvasUpAvartata|yaḥ̍ purA Badraḥ saMpApIyAn̍ thsyAt|sa punarvasvO-ragni-mAda̍dhIta|puna̍rEvaina̍M̍ ~MvAmaM ~MvasUpAvartatE|BadrO̍ Bavati||yaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ dAnakAmA̍ mE prajAḥ syuriti|sa̍ pUrvayOḥ̍ PalgunyO-ragni-mAda̍dhIta|8̍ (10)

aryamṇO vA Etannakṣatram|yatpUrvE̍ PalgunI|aryamEti̍ tamAhuryO̍ dadAti|dAna̍kAmA̍ asmai prajA Bavanti||yaḥ̍ kAmayEta̍ BagI syAmiti|sa̍ uttarayOḥ̍ PalgunyO-ragnimAda̍dhIta|Baga̍sya̍ vA Etannakṣatram|yadutta̍rE̍ PalgunI|BagyE̍va̍ Bavati||kAlaka~jjA̍ vai nAmAsurA̍ Asann|9 (10)

tE suvargAya̍# lOkAyAgni-macinvata|puru̍ṣa̍ iṣṭakA-mupA̍dadhAt-puru̍ṣa̍ iṣṭakAm|sa̍ indrO̱ brAhmaṇO bruvAṇa̍ iṣṭakAmupA̍dhatta|EṣA̍ mE# citrA nAmEti|tE̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamAprArOhann|sa̍ indra iṣṭakAmAvRu̍hat|tE&vA̍kIryanta|yE̍&vAkI̱ryanta|ta̍ UrṇAvaBayO&Bavann|dvAvuda̍patatAm|10̍ (10)

tau divyau śvAnAvaBavatAm|yO̍ BrAtRuvyavAn̍ thsyAt|sa citrAyA-magni-mAda̍dhIta|avakIryaiva̍ BrAtRuvyAn|OjO̍ balamindriyaM̍ ~MvIryamAtman-dha̍ttE||vasantA̱̍ brAhmaṇO̱ &gnimAdadhIta|vasantO̍ vai brA̱hmaṇasyartuḥ|sva Evaina-mRutAvAdhAya̍|brahmavarcasI̍ Bavati|muKaM̍ ~MvA EtadRutUnAm|11̍ (10)

yad-vasantaḥ|yO̍ vasantA&gnimAdhattE|muKya̍# Eva Bavati|athO̍ yOnimantamEvainaM̍ prajAtamAdha̍ttE|grIṣmE̍ rAjanya̍# AdadhIta|grIṣmO̍ vai rAjanya̍syartuḥ|sva̍ EvainamRutAvAdhAya̍|indriyAvI̍ Bavati|śaradi̍ vaiśya AdadhIta|śaradvai̍ vaiśyasyartuḥ|12̍ (10)

sva EvainamRutAvAdhAya̍|paśumAn̍ Bavati||na̍ pUrvayOḥ̍ PalgunyO-ragnimAda̍dhIta|EṣA̍ vai jaGanyA̍# rAtriḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarasya|yatpUrvE̍ PalgunI|pRuṣṭita̍ Eva saM~MvathsarasyA-gnimAdhAya̍|pApI̍yAn-Bavati|utta̍rayOrAda̍dhIta|EṣA̍ vai prathamA̍ rAtriḥ̍ saM~Mvathsarasya|yadutta̍rE̍ PalgunI̍ ( )|muKata Eva saM~MvathsarasyA-gnimAdhAya̍|vasI̍yAn̍ Bavati||athO Kalu|yadaivaina̍M̍ ~Myajña upanamE̱t|athAda̍dhIta|saivAsyarddhi̍ḥ||13̍ (16) 1.1.3 anuvAkaM 3 - dEvayajanArthAḥ saMBArAḥ

uddhanti|yadEvAsyA̍# amEddhyam|tadapa# hanti||apO&vO̱kṣati śAntyai̱||sikatA̍ nivapati|EtadvA̍ agnEr vai̱śvAnarasya# rUpam|rUpEṇaiva vai̱śvAnaramava-rundhE||UṣAn̍ nivapati|puṣṭirvA̍ EṣA prajananam|yadUṣA̱ḥ|14̍ (10)

puṣṭyAmEva̍ prajananE̍ &gnimAdhattE|athO̍# saMqjñAna# Eva|saM jñAnaṅq hyEtat̍ paśUnAm|yadUṣA̱ḥ||dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ sahAstA̱m|tE viyatI̍ abrUtAm|astvEva̍ nau# saha yajñiyamiti|yadamuṣyA̍# yajñiyamAsI̱t|tadasyA-madadhAt|ta̍ UṣA# aBavann|15 (10)

yadasyA yajñiyamAsI̱t|tadamuṣyA-madadhAt|tadadaścandrama̍si̍ kRuṣṇam|UṣA̱nnivapannadO̍ ddhyAyEt|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOrEva̍ yajñiyE-&gnimAdhattE||agnirdEvEByO̍ nilAyata|AKU̍ rUpaM kRutvA|sa pRuthivIM̍ prAviśat|sa̍ UtIḥ kurvAṇaḥ̍ pRuthivImanu̍ samacarat|tadA̍KukarIṣa-ma̍Bavat|16̍ (10)

yadAKukarIṣaṃ̍ saBAMqrO̍ Bavati|yadEvAsya̍ tatra nyaktam|tadEvAva̍rundhE||UrjaM̍ ~MvA Etaṃ rasaM̍ pRuthivyA upadIkA̍ uddihanti|yad̍ valmIka̱m|yad valmIkavapA̍ saBAMqrO̍ Bavati|Urja̍mEva̍ rasaM̍ pRuthivyA avarundhE|athO̍ śrOtramEva|śrOtraṅq̍ hyEtat̍ pRuthivyAḥ|yad̍ valmIkaḥ||17̍ (10)

abadhirO̍ Bavati|ya EvaM ~MvEda||prajApa̍tiḥ̍ prajA asRujata|tAsAmanna-mupA̱kṣIyata|tAByaḥ̍ sUdamupa prABinat|tatO̍ vai tAsAmannaM nAkṣIyata|yasya̍ sUdaḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|nAsya̍# gRuhE&nnaM̍ kṣIyatE||ApO vA idamagrE# salilamAsIt|tEna̍# prajApatiraśrAmyat|18̍ (10)

kathamidaṅ syAditi|sO̍&paśyat̍ puṣkaraparṇaM tiṣṭhat|sO̍&manyata|asti̍ vai tat|yasmin-nidamadhi̍ tiṣṭhatIti|sa̍ varAhO̍ rUpaM kRutvOpanyamajjat|sa̍ pRuthivImadha̍ A̱rcCat|tasyA# upahatyOdamajjat|tat̍ puṣkaraparṇE̱̍ &prathayat|yadaprathayat|19̍ (10)

tat pRuthivyai̍ pRuthivitvam|aBUdvA̍ idamiti|tadBUmyai̍# BUmitvam|tAM diśO&nu vAtaḥ samavahat|tAṃ̍ śarkarABiradRuṃ̍ hat|śaM ~Mvai nO&BUditi̍|tacCarka̍rAṇAṃ̍ śarkaratvam|yad-varAhavi̍hataṃ̍ saMBArO Bavati|asyAmEvA-Ca̍mbaṭkAramagni-mAdha̍ttE|śarka̍rA̍ Bavanti dhRutyai̱|20 (10)

athO# śatvAMya||sarE̍tA̍ agnirAdhEya ityAhuḥ|ApO̍ varuṇasya̍ patnaya̍ Asann|tA agniraByaddhyAyat|tAḥ̍ samaBavat|tasya̍ rEtaḥ parA&patat|taddhira̍ṇya-maBavat|yaddhira̍ṇya-mupAsya̍ti|sarE̍tasamEvAgni-mAdha̍ttE||puru̍ṣa̍ invai svAd-rEtasO̍ bIBathsata ityAhuḥ|21̍ (10)

uttarata upA̱syatya-bIBathsAyai||ati̍ prayacCati|Arti̍mEvAti̍ prayacCati||agnirdEvEByO̍ nilAyata|aśvO̍# rUpaM kRutvA|sO̱&śvatthE saM~Mvathsara-ma̍tiṣṭhat|tada̍śvatthasyA̱-śvatthatvam|yadAśva̍tthaḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|yadEvAsya̍ tatra nyaktam|tadEvAva̍-rundhE||22̍ (10)

dEvA vA UrjaM ~MvyaBajanta|tata̍# udumbara udatiṣṭhat|UrgvA̍ udumbara̍ḥ|yadaudu̍mbaraḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|Urja̍mEvAva̍-rundhE||tRutIya̍syAmitO̍ divi sOma# AsIt|taM gAyatryAha̍rat|tasya̍# parṇamacCidyata|tatparṇO̍# &Bavat|tat parṇasya# parṇatvam|23 (10)

yasya# parṇamayaḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|sOmapIthamEvAva̍# rundhE||dEvA vai brahmannavadanta|tat̍ parṇa upAśRuṇOt|suśravA̍ vai nAma|yat̍ parṇamaya̍ḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|brahmavarcasamEvAva̍# rundhE||prajApati-ragni-ma̍sRujata|sO̍&biBEtpra̍ mA# dhakṣyatIti|taṃ̍ śamyA&śamayat|24̍ (10)

tacCamyai# śamitvam|yacCamImaya̍ḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|śAntyA̍ apradAhAya||agnEḥ̍ sRuṣṭasya# yataḥ|vika~gkataM̍ BA A̱rcCat|yad-vaika~gkataḥ̍ saMBArO Bavati|BA̍ EvAvarundhE||sahRu̍dayO̍ &gnirAdhEya ityAhuḥ|marutO&dBiragni-ma̍tamayann|tasya̍# tAntasya hRudayamAcCi̍ndann̍ ( )|sA&śaniraBavat|yadaśani̍hatasya̍ vRukṣasya# saMBArO Bavati|sahRu̍daya-mEvAgni-mAdha̍ttE||25̍ (13) (UṣA# - aBavan - naBavad - valmIkrO̱ - &śrAmya - daprathaya̍ - ddhRutyai# - bIBathsata ityAhu̍ - rundhE - parṇatva - maśamayada̍ - cCindaṅq strIṇi# ca) (A3) 1.1.4 anuvAkaM 4 - saMBArasaM~MyuktAyatanEṣu agnyAdhAnam

dvAdaśasu# vikrAmEṣvagnimAdadhIta|dvAda̍śa̍ mAsA̱ḥ saM~Mvathsaraḥ|saM~MvathsarA-dEvaina-mavaruddhyA-dha̍ttE||yad-dvA̍daśasu̍# vikrAmE-ṣvAdadhIta|pari̍mitamava̍rundhIta|cakṣu̍r̍ nimita AdadhIta|iyad-dvAda̍śa̍ vikrAmA(3) iti|pari̍mitaM̍ caivAparimitaM̍ cAvarundhE||anRu̍taM̍ ~Mvai vAcA vadati|anRu̍taM̍ manasA̍ ddhyAyati|26 (10)

cakṣur vai satyam|adrA(3)gityAha|ada̍ṛśamiti̍|tath̍ satyam|yaścakṣur-nimitE&gni-mA̍dhattE|satya̍ Evaina-mAdhattE||tasmAdAhi̍tAgnirnAnRu̍taM̍ ~MvadEt|nAsya# brAhmaṇO&nA̱śvAn gRuhE vasEt|satyE̍ hyasyAgnirAhi̍taḥ||AgnEyI̍ vai rAtriḥ|27̍ (10)

AgnEyAḥ paśavaḥ|aindramaha̍ḥ|naktaM̍ gAṛhapatya-mAda̍dhAti|paśUnEvAva̍-rundhE|divA̍&&havanIya̱m|indriyamEvA-va̍rundhE||arddhOdi̍tE̍ sUrya# AhavanIya-mAdadhAti|Etasmin̍ vai lOkE prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata|prajA̍ Eva tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ sRujatE|athO# BUtaM caiva BaviṣyaccA-va̍rundhE||28̍ (10)

iḍA vai mAnavI̍ yajñAnUkAśinyA̍sIt|sA&śRu̍ṇOt|asu̍rA̍ agnimAdadhata̍ iti|tada̍gacCat|ta̍ AhavanIyamagra̍ Adadhata|atha̍ gAṛhapatyam|athA̱-nvAhArya-paca̍nam|sA̍ &bravIt|pratIcyE̍ṣAṅq̍ śrIragAt|BadrA̍ BUtvA parABaviṣyantIti̍|29̍ (10)

yasyaiva-magnirAdhIyatE̱|pratIcya̍sya̍ śrIrEti|BadrO̍ BUtvA parABavati||sA&śRu̍ṇOt|dEvA̍ agni-mAdadhata̍ iti|tada̍gacCat|tE̱&nvAhArya-paca̍namagra̍ Adadhata|atha̍ gAṛhapatyam|athA̍havanIya̱m|sA&bra̍vIt|30̍ (10)

prAcyEṣAṅq̍ śrIragAt|BadrA̍ BUtvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamE̱ṣyanti|prajAM tu na vE̱thsyanta iti|yasyaivamagni-rA̍dhIyatE̱|prAcya̍sya̍ śrIrEti|BadrO̍ BUtvA suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamEti|prajAM̍ tu na vindatE||sA&bra̍vIdiḍA̍ manu̱m|tathA vA ahaM tavAgni-mAdhA̱syAmi|yathA pra prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair janiṣyasE̱|31̍ (10)

pratyasmin ~MlOkE sthAsyasi|aBi̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM jEṣyasIti|gAṛha̍patyamagra̍ AdadhAt|gAṛha̍patyaM̍ ~MvA anu# prajAḥ paśavaḥ prajAyantE|gAṛha̍patyEnaivAsmai̱̍ prajAM paśUn prAjanayat|athA̱-nvAhArya-paca̍nam|tirya~g~g̍va̍ vA ayaM ~MlOkaḥ|asminnEva tEna# lOkE pratyatiṣṭhat|athA̍havanIya̱m|tEnaiva̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOka-maByajayat|32̍ (10)

yasyaivamagni-rAdhIyatE̱|pra̍ prajayA# paśuBir̍ mithunair jAyatE|pratyasmin̍ ~MlOkE tiṣṭhati|aBi̍ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM jayati||yasya̍ vA ayathAdEvatamagni-rA̍dhIyatE̱|A̍ dEvatA̱ByO vRuścyatE|pApIyAn̍ Bavati|yasya# yathA dEvatam|na dEvatA̱Bya AvRuścyatE|vasI̍yAn̍ Bavati ( )|33 (10)

BRugUṇAM̍ tvA&~ggirasAM̍ ~MvratapatE vratEnA-dadhAmIti̍# BRugva~ggirasAmAdaddhyAt|AdityAnA̱M̍ tvA dEvAnA̱M ~MvratapatE vratEnAdadhAmItyanyAsAM̍ brAhmaṇInAM̍ prajAnA̱m|varuṇasya̍ tvA rAjñO̱ vratapatE vratEnAdadhAmIti̍ rAjñaḥ|indra̍sya̍ tvEndriyEṇa# vratapatE vratEnAdadhAmIti̍# rAjanyasya|manO̱stvA̍ grAmaṇyO̱ vratapatE vratEnAdadhAmIti̍ vaiśyasya|RuBUṇAM̍ tvA# dEvAnA̱M ~MvratapatE vratEnAdadhAmIti̍# rathakArasya|yathA̍ dEvatamagni-rAdhIyatE|na̍ dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE|vasI̍yAn̍ Bavati||34 (9) 1.1.5 anuvAkaM 5 - tatra pavamAnahabIMṣi

prajApatir̍ vAcaḥ satya-mapaśyat|tEnAgnimAdha̍tta|tEna̍ vai sa A̱rddhnOt|BUrBuvaḥ suvarityAha|Etadvai̍ vAcaḥ satyam|ya EtEnAgni-mAdhattE|RuddhnOtyEva|athO̍# satyaprAśUrEva̍ Bavati|athO̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnaBicara̍ti|stRuṇuta̍ Evaina̱m

BUrityAha|prajA̍ Eva tad-yajamAnaḥ̍ sRujatE|Buva ityAha|asminnEva̍ lOkE prati# tiṣṭhati|suvarityAha|suvarga̍ Eva lOkE prati# tiṣṭhati||triBirakṣarair-gAṛhapatya-mAda̍dhAti|traya̍# imE lOkAḥ|EṣvEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkEṣu pratiṣṭhita-mAdha̍ttE|sarvai̱ḥ̍ pa~jcaBi-rAhavanIya̱m|36̍ (10)

suvargAya vA Eṣa lOkAyAdhIyatE|yadA̍havanIya̍ḥ|suvarga̍ EvAsmai# lOkE vAcaḥ satyaṃ sarvamApnOti||triBir̍ gAṛhapatya-mAda̍dhAti|pa~jcaBi̍-rAhavanIya̱m|aṣṭau̍ saMpadyantE|aṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI|gAyatrO̱&gniḥ|yAvAnEvAgniḥ|tamAdha̍ttE||37̍ (10)

prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata|tA̍ asmAth̍ sRuṣṭAḥ parAcIrAyann|tAByO̍ jyOti-rudagRuhṇAt|taM̍ jyOtiḥ paśyantIḥ̍ prajA aBisamAvartanta|uparI̍vAgni-mudgRu̍hṇIyA-duddharann̍|jyOti̍rEva̍ paśyantIḥ̍ prajA yajamAna-maBi-samAva̍rtantE||prajApa̍tErakṣya̍śvayat|tat̍ parA&patat|tadaśvO̍&Bavat|tadaśva̍syA-śvatvam|38̍ (10)

Eṣa vai prajApatiḥ|yadagniḥ|prAjApatyO&śva̍ḥ|yadaśva̍M̍ purastAnnayati|svamEva̍ cakṣuḥ paśyan̍ prajApati-ranUdE̍ti||vajrI̍ vA Eṣaḥ|yadaśvaḥ|yadaśva̍M̍ purastAnnayati|jAtAnEva̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ praṇudatE||punarAva̍rtayati|39̍ (10)
